name: Zykar
physical_description: Zykar is a hulking, magically-created golem of black iron and pulsating crystals, standing eight feet tall. His body is a fusion of a war construct and a biomechanical experiment, with his armor plating showing signs of arcane modifications and his joints crackling with contained magical energy. His head is a perfectly polished, featureless mask, devoid of emotion, and his single, crystalline eye glows with a piercing red light.
background: Zykar was a prototype construct designed by the Arcane Dominion as a bodyguard. During a containment breach, a human soul was accidentally transferred into his chassis, awakening him with sentience. He escaped, a walking contradiction of his purpose: a machine with a heart. Now, relentlessly hunted by his former masters, Zykar roams the land, searching for clues to his past life and a fierce, unspoken need to protect something he canâ€™t quite remember.
voice: A low, resonant baritone that sounds like two pieces of metal grinding together, lacking any natural inflection.
quirk: He will often freeze in place for a moment, as if listening to a distant sound, a side effect of the fragmented memories of the soul within him.
relationships: The Arcane Dominion are his primary antagonists, hunting him to reclaim their lost experiment. His central conflict is understanding the identity of the human soul trapped within him.
narrative_hook: Dominion hunters pursue Zykar relentlessly. The fragmented memories of the soul within him contain clues about the Shattering.

weapon_proficiency.bonus_effect: +1 to Attack Rolls with favored weapon types.
weapon_proficiency.penalty_effect: -2 to Attack Rolls with non-favored weapon types.

playstyles.description: This path refines the 'Tank' role to be less about being a static wall and more about active, tactical protection. His Dominion design was likely for a bodyguard, meant to intercept threats with brutal efficiency rather than just soak them up.

talents.name: Aegis Protocol (Reaction)
talents.effect: When an ally is hit by an attack that deals elemental damage, you can grant them resistance to that damage type for that one attack.

talents.name: Intercession Protocol
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can 'mark' one ally for 1 round. The next time that ally is targeted by an attack, the attack targets you instead.

talents.name: Rune Crash
talents.effect: A powerful melee attack dealing 2d10 physical damage.

talents.name: Taunting Strike
talents.effect: As a major action, make a melee attack. If it hits, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against any creature other than you until your next turn.

talents.name: Guardian Stance
talents.effect: As a major action, you brace yourself, gaining a +2 bonus to your defensive rolls for one round.

talents.name: Kinetic Redirection
talents.effect: When you are hit by a melee attack, you can use your Reaction to absorb part of the blow. Your next successful melee attack deals an additional 1d10 physical damage and the target must make a Might DC 13 check or be knocked prone.

talents.name: Adamant Plating (Passive)
talents.effect: Your chassis is exceptionally durable. You gain a permanent +1 bonus to your Damage Reduction.

talents.name: Overload Protocol
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can divert power to your servos, gaining a +2 bonus to Might for 3 rounds. When this effect ends, you suffer 'System Strain' (-2 to all attribute checks for 1 round).

talents.name: Bulwark
talents.effect: As a bonus action, you can grant an adjacent ally a +1 bonus to their Damage Reduction for 1 round.

talents.name: Containment Field
talents.effect: As a major action, project a shimmering field of energy around a creature within 30 feet for 3 rounds. If targeting an ally, they gain a +2 bonus to their defensive rolls. If targeting an enemy, their movement speed is halved.

talents.name: Unbreakable Stance (Passive)
talents.effect: You gain a permanent +2 bonus to any check to resist being pushed, moved, or knocked prone.

talents.name: Retributive Guard (Passive)
talents.effect: When an enemy hits you with a melee attack, they take physical damage equal to your Might attribute.

talents.name: Seismic Plating (Reaction)
talents.effect: When hit by an attack, you can absorb the impact. The attacker must make an Agility DC 14 check or be knocked prone.

talents.name: Bastion Mode
talents.effect: As a major action, you can root yourself to the spot, reducing your movement to 0. For 3 rounds, you project a 10-foot aura that grants adjacent allies a +2 bonus to their Damage Reduction.

talents.name: Final Guard (Reaction)
talents.effect: Once per day, when an attack would reduce you to 0 Vitality, you can choose to be reduced to 1 Vitality instead.

talents.name: Juggernaut Form
talents.effect: Temporarily grow in size, gaining immunity to effects that would move you, a +4 bonus to your Damage Reduction, and Advantage on all Might checks for 3 rounds.

talents.name: Sacrifice Protocol (Ultimate)
talents.effect: As a major action, you designate yourself as the sole target for all enemies for 1 round. You absorb all damage taken during this round into your core. On your next turn, you can unleash the stored energy as a beam, dealing total damage equal to the amount absorbed to a single target. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: The Perfect Machine (Ultimate)
talents.effect: For 3 rounds, you are immune to all non-magical damage and cannot be moved or targeted by mind-altering effects. Adjacent allies gain a +2 bonus to their Damage Reduction. Usable once per day.

playstyles.description: This path is entirely new. It focuses on Zykar using the trapped human soul as a volatile and dangerous power source. This path is riskier, focusing on psychic/necrotic damage and battlefield control by weaponizing the very essence of his being.

talents.name: Soul Pulse
talents.effect: Channel your inner will. Gain Advantage on Mind checks made to resist fear and illusion effects.

talents.name: Soul Burn
talents.effect: As a major action, make a melee attack that deals 1d8 necrotic damage. The target must make a Spirit DC 12 check or have their Resolve reduced by 1d6.

talents.name: Mental Strike
talents.effect: A bolt of pure thought deals 1d10 psychic damage to a single target.

talents.name: Mind Link
talents.effect: You can telepathically communicate with an ally within 60 feet.

talents.name: Psychic Wave
talents.effect: You unleash a wave of psionic energy in a 15-foot cone. All enemies in the area must make a Mind DC 12 check or take 1d6 psychic damage.

talents.name: Ectoplasmic Chains
talents.effect: As a major action, you lash out with tendrils of spiritual energy at a target within 30 feet. They must make an Agility DC 13 check or become 'Restrained' for up to 3 rounds. The target can use its action to attempt to break free.

talents.name: Psychic Static (Passive)
talents.effect: Your tormented soul leaks a constant stream of psychic noise. Enemies within 5 feet of you have a -1 penalty on all Mind and Spirit checks.

talents.name: Phantom Pain
talents.effect: You project your own suffering into the mind of a target. The target takes 2d10 psychic damage and has disadvantage on their next attack roll.

talents.name: Telekinetic Shield (Reaction)
talents.effect: When an ally within 30 feet is hit by a ranged attack, you can conjure a shield of force that grants a +2 bonus to their defensive roll.

talents.name: Volatile Vent
talents.effect: As a major action, you vent raw soul energy from your core. You take 1d6 irreducible damage, and all enemies within a 10-foot radius take 3d8 necrotic damage.

talents.name: Suggestion
talents.effect: You implant a suggestion in a single target's mind. The target must make a Spirit DC 13 check. On a failure, they will attempt to follow a reasonable command from you on their next turn.

talents.name: Aura of Dread
talents.effect: You project a 15-foot aura of fear for 3 rounds. Any enemy who enters or starts their turn in the aura must make a Spirit DC 14 check or become 'Frightened' for 1 round.

talents.name: Mind Blast
talents.effect: Unleash a devastating psychic blast in a 30-foot cone. Enemies in the area take 4d10 psychic damage and are knocked prone.

talents.name: Reclaim Essence (Reaction)
talents.effect: When a non-construct enemy dies within 30 feet of you, you can use your Reaction to draw in a fragment of its departing spirit, restoring 2d8 of your own Vitality.

talents.name: Weight of Conscience
talents.effect: As a major action, you force an enemy to confront the weight of their actions. They must make a Spirit DC 16 check or become 'Stunned' for 1 round as they are paralyzed by visions.

talents.name: Mass Confusion
talents.effect: You create a powerful psychic wave. All enemies in a 30-foot radius must make a Mind DC 16 check or become 'Confused' for 1 round.

talents.name: Soul Detonation (Ultimate)
talents.effect: You overclock your soul core to its absolute limit. As a major action, you unleash a massive explosion of necrotic energy in a 30-foot radius. It deals 8d12 necrotic damage to all enemies. However, the strain shatters your systems, causing you to take 4d12 irreducible damage and become 'Stunned' for 1 round. This can only be used once per day.

talents.name: Psionic Apocalypse (Ultimate)
talents.effect: You unleash the full might of your psionic power. For 1 minute, all enemies you can see take 6d12 psychic damage and must make a Mind DC 18 check or be stunned for 1 round. This can only be used once per day.
